text:
9,95 €
Soul journey - Your guided imagery for spiritual growth Things in life are so different than we imagine. We have forgotten so much, especially about our soul journey. This guided meditation "Soul Journey - Native American wisdom about the circle of life" from meditation teacher and spiritual life coach Seraphine Monien is essential and beneficial for your spiritual growth. You will come to the profound understanding that the earth is a world where the soul can forget that it is a wayfarer traveling through different worlds. All life travels through these worlds. What is transformed are the bodies, while the souls collect experiences in the worlds. Find guidance in case of grief and loss and bereavement support Especially in times of grief and loss we need a deeper understanding about the circle of life. This guided meditation "Soul journey" is a loving support and offers grief counseling, because it helps you feel and understand that love is a bond that keeps us connected always and in all worlds, and through which we will always find each other again. This guided meditation also has a beneficial impact in case of spiritual hospice care. You will sense that no loving soul is ever lost to God. With this meditation, you clothe yourself in love and you will feel confidence and hope wherever your journey will take you. Calming sound design for your sense of security Like all guided meditations and exercises from spiritual life coach Seraphine Monien, this guided meditation "Soul journey" incorporates an amazing sound design. It is accompanied by specially-arranged, continuous, gentle music that includes calming, three-dimensionally recorded nature sounds from North American places in nature (without loops). With varied, subtly-balanced volume levels, the words and music harmoniously lead your consciousness into a state of deep healing relaxation, and then back again to waking consciousness. In a state of deep relaxation, a gentle balance between spoken guidance and pauses allows you to grow spiritually. You will calmly receive the love and light suffused in the words of this guided imagery. Download your "Soul journey" now Download now and let yourself flow in the healing wisdom of this inspiring and caring guided meditation "Soul journey". About the author Seraphine Monien is an internationally trained teacher for meditation, self-hypnosis, mindfulness, relaxation, and stress relief. For over a decade, many people have experienced major improvements in their lives through her competent and professionally sound life coaching and spiritual counseling in Hamburg and throughout Europe. The guided meditations and relaxation exercises that she developed for Sera Benia Publishing are for beginners and the advanced. They have already reached a worldwide audience. Note: Do not listen to the meditations while engaging in activities that demand your attention (operating machinery, driving, etc.). The products and offerings from Sera Benia Publishing do not provide diagnoses or promises of healing, nor do they replace consultation with a doctor or health practitioner, or any other therapeutic treatments.
